name: MedRoom VR
description:
MedRoom VR is the future of high-level medical communication, training, and preparation. It creates a digital space that can bridge physical barriers between medical professionals, care providers, patients, and healthcare workers, providing a visual medium that is more efficient than video conferences or telephone calls, and more convenient than traveling vast distances to meet in person. There is a large amount of functionality that could be added using the unique benefits of virtual reality.

As a communication platform geared specifically toward the health industry, MedRoom VR features tools that can help medschool students, researchers, and patients alike. Students can practice in interviews, doctors can collaborate, and patients can meet with them, all without the need to meet in person, with all the benefits that Virtual reality brings to the table.
